### ExpandMOVSZX&#95;RR() {#a0ea5ffee956540dce97bf5d067051c6b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool M68kInstrInfo::ExpandMOVSZX&#95;RR (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder">MachineInstrBuilder</a> &amp; MIB, bool IsSigned, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> MVTDst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> MVTSrc) const</>}>
Move from register and extend.

Expand SExt MOVE pseudos into a MOV and a EXT if the operands are two different registers or just EXT if it is the same register.

### getRegisterInfo() {#a1724b42261bb43e90d6867f60d6759e7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const M68kRegisterInfo &amp; llvm::M68kInstrInfo::getRegisterInfo () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> is a superset of MRegister info.

As such, whenever a client has an instance of instruction info, it should always be able to get register info as well (through this method).
